sub_fields.label: Block ID
sub_fields.name: block_id
sub_fields.instructions: Each instagram block needs a unique identifier

choices.start: Align column to the left or top
choices.end: Align column to the right or bottom

choices.space-between: Distribute items evenly along a row with no space at the ends
choices.space-around: Distribute items evenly along a row with space at the ends

choices.space-between: Distribute items evenly along a column with no space at the ends
choices.space-around: Distribute items evenly along a column with space at the ends

sub_fields.label: Animation Effect
sub_fields.name: column_animation_effect
sub_fields.instructions: For an example of each effect, visit https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/

choices.space-between: Distribute columns evenly along the row with no space at the ends
choices.space-around: Distribute columns evenly along the row with space at the ends

choices.space-between: Distribute columns evenly along the column with no space at the ends
choices.space-around: Distribute columns evenly along the column with space at the ends

choices.stretch: Make all columns the same height or width
Make all columns the same height or width

sub_fields.label: Animation Effect
sub_fields.name: row_animation_effect
sub_fields.instructions: For an example of each effect, visit https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/

sub_fields.label: Animation Duration
sub_fields.name: row_animation_duration
sub_fields.instructions: Choose an animation duration. 1 equals 1 second

sub_fields.label: Animation Offset
sub_fields.name: row_animation_offset
sub_fields.instructions: 100 means after 100px of the element are in view, the animation will start
